description.title: AMD Ryzen Boxed Cooling Fan Original
description.details: AMD Ryzen Boxed Cooling Fans are the Original CPU coolers usually offered with an AMD Ryzen series of processors. This CPU supports the AMD Ryzen family of CPUs. Namely Ryzen 3, Ryzen 5, Ryzen 7, and Ryzen 9. The supported Socket of this cooler is AM4. This cooler has a 90 mm Fan and the size is 90x90x25mm. The CPU fan utilizes a Fluid Bearing. The Fan Life is 100000 hrs and the cooler's Power Interface is a 4pin PWM connector as a Power Interface. it is compatible with any AM4 Socket Compatible Processor. The Heatsink is a specialized AMD CPU Heatsink made with Aluminum. The Aluminium heatsink and 4pin power connector ensure maximum efficiency.

description.title: Deepcool UD551 ARGB CPU Air Cooler
description.details: The DeepCool UD551 ARGB CPU Cooler is an efficient top flow cooling solution for AMD sockets equipped with a high-performance 136mm fan and an ARGB LED ring with motherboard sync support. The UD551 is designed for AMD sockets only. It features cooling with a fan mounted top-down quickly dissipates heat directly over the heat sink covering the CPU which also introduces additional airflow over motherboard components surrounding the socket such as the VRM and RAM. The 136mm PWM cooling fan balances the best of performance and noise to ensure your system is at its best. You can customize and control the addressable RGB LEDs with 16.8 million color options that best fit your style and setup. Fine-tune your settings and synchronize with supported motherboard software through the 3-pin 5V ARGB connector. Enjoy a colorful cooling combination in this classic form factor. The Deepcool UD551 comes with a 1-year warranty.

description.title: Gamdias BOREAS E1L-010 RGB CPU Air Cooler
description.details: The Gamdias BOREAS E1L-010 is an RGB low-profile cooler with a premium stealth black finish intended for Intel LGA 1700 sockets. Its tiny yet powerful design fits seamlessly into all-in-one systems and numerous form factor designs, thanks to a sturdy 120mm hydraulic PWM fan, ARGB motherboard sync, a durable aluminum heatsink, and a well-designed DTC structure.The Gamdias BOREAS E1L-010, which is outfitted with a 120mm PWM hydraulic bearing fan capable of 2000RPM and a strong aluminum fin structure for long-term endurance, delivers a powerful airflow at a low noise level and effective heat dissipation.The Gamdias BOREAS E1L-010 RGB CPU Air Cooler can illuminate your build with built-in rainbow lighting effects or synchronize it with addressable RGB lighting that is compatible with many motherboards that have a 5V 3-Pin Addressable RGB Header.For improved heat dissipation, a redesigned aluminum base offers smooth contact and greater coverage of the CPU. The premium stealth black heatsink has a larger surface area for better cooling performance.The Gamdias BOREAS E1L-010 RGB CPU Air Cooler is Compatible with 1200/115X/1700 sockets, the all-in-one mounting system makes the installation process quick and straightforward. This CPU Air Cooler comes with a 02-year warranty.

UX100 supports motherboards that have a 5V addressable RGB header, allowing you to control the lights directly.The fan blades are built to generate a large volume of air passing through the aluminum heatsink at any angle for the steady air flow and cooling quality.The hydraulic bearing self-lubricates with a high quality, friction-reducing substance that lowers operation noise and enhance thermal efficiency. The seal cap prevents leakage of the lubricant and extends the lifespan of the unit.The mounting kit offers hassle-free installation. UX100 includes all-in-one back-plate is compatible with all the latest Intel and AMD CPU socket.

description.title: Thermaltake Contact 9 Air CPU Cooler
description.details: The Thermaltake Contac 9 CPU Cooler provides superb cooling while being whisper-quiet. For good heat dissipation, it has 0.4mm thick aluminum fins and 3 Direct Touch heat pipes. The integrated 92mm PWM-controlled fan has high airflow fan blades and a long-life hydraulic bearing to provide airflow optimization and dependability. Supports the most recent Intel and AMD CPU sockets. The fan blades are designed to provide excellent cooling performance while also producing a huge volume of air traveling through the heatsink at any angle.The hydraulic bearing self-lubricates with a high-quality, friction-reducing substance that lowers operation noise and optimizes thermal efficiency. The seal cap prevents leakage of the lubricant and improves the lifespan of the unit.Thermaltake Contact 9 Air CPU Cooler It has 0.4mm thick aluminum fins with a 2.5mm air gap and 3 x 6mm solid copper heat pipes for optimal heat transmission. To guarantee quick and effective heat dissipation, the heat pipes are in constant direct contact with the CPU. The side flow configuration of the tower improves thermal performance as well.Attach the fan to Contac 9 tightly and evenly with the included special-designed fan clips, which also make assembly and dismantling way much easier.The non-interference cooling design eliminates the co-existing problem of high-performance RAM and CPU coolers to achieve the best RAM clearance.The All-in-One backplate design is compatible with both Intel and AMD sockets. LGA 1366/1156/ 1155/ 1151/ 1150/ 775 Intel LGA 1366/ 1156/ 1155/ 1151/ 1150/ 775 AMD AM4/ FM2/ FM1/ AM3+/ AM3/AM2+/ AM2+/ AM2. The Thermaltake Contact 9 Air CPU Cooler comes with a 01-year warranty.

description.title: Redragon CC-2000 Effect RGB Air CPU Cooler
description.details: Redragon CC-2000 Effect RGB CPU Cooler delivers a constant and quiet airflow with a cooling capacity that allows you to play, render and demand the maximum. Also, it has RGB lighting. This CPU cooler has four 6mm copper tubes designed to ensure maximum efficiency in the transfer of heat from the paste to the air flow generated by the fan. The premium quality of this critical component is the secret to the CPU cooler's high efficiency. This cooler has 4 PIN Connector PWM Silent Fan which automatically controls the fan speed according to the temperature of the CPU efficiently and decreases fan noise. The Direct touched heat pipes attaches the aluminum cold plate to the surface of a CPU directly. This can constantly reduce the heat bypassing the thermal energy to every single fin. There are a total of 4 Pure Copper Heat Pipes. These high thermal conductivity can take the heat out of the CPU quickly. Redragon CC-2000 CPU Cooler virtuous cycle of refrigeration is completed with the fan, which reaches upto 1700 RPM. This allows it to generate airflow of up to 61.5 cubic feet per minute, which produces enough heat dissipation from the enclosure to the outside to allow optimal microprocessor performance in demanding situations.We all know that good LED lighting, for some incomprehensible reason, makes us compete better. For this reason, Redragon CC-2000 Effect incorporates an RGB led lighting system that will light up your war machine as it deserves.Redragon CC-2000 Effect CPU cooler is compatible with the most popular and commonly circulated sockets on the market, from the most modern and professional models of the main manufacturers like Intel's LGA 2011 or AMD's AM4. It also supports older models such as the LGA 775 and the AMD FM1.This CPU Cooler has a Easy Installation. the premium quality materials ensures a longer lifespan.This cooler weights 861g and the dimensions are 120 x 76 x 160 mm. It has 1 year of warranty.

description.title: Gamdias BOREAS E1-410 WH CPU Air Cooler
description.details: The BOREAS E1 410 WH CPU Air Cooler is a snowy white inexpensive high-performance CPU air cooler with completely configurable ARGB lights. It incorporates all of GAMDIAS's cooling technology while being extremely competitive. It contains a high airflow PWM fan and four copper heat pipes with direct contact technology. This CPU Air Cooler allows you to customize addressable RGB lights using motherboard manufacturer sync software. It has an integrated rainbow wave LED effect and a thick base plate with high cooling performance. The BOREAS E1 410 WH comes with Hydraulic Bearing and Universal Socket Mounting Kits.The BOREAS E1 410 features GAMDIAS Heatpipe DTC (Direct Touch Contact) technology that allows the heat pipes to make direct contact with the CPU for unobstructed direct heat transfer.The BOREAS E1 410 comes with Enjoy the completely customized illumination of the high-performance BOREAS E1 ARGB PWM fan, or connect it to any motherboard with a 5V 3-Pin Addressable RGB Header.The GAMDIAS Universal Mounting Kit for the BOREAS E1 410 enables quick installations on both the newest AMD and Intel systems. The LGA2066, 2011-v3, 2011, 1700, 1151, 1150, 1155, 1200, AM4, AM3+, AM3, AM2+, AM2, FM2+, FM2, and FM1 CPU sockets are all compatible with the Gamdias BOREAS E1-410 WH CPU Air Cooler. It may shoot in with a series of dazzling auroral brightness thanks to the ability of all Motherboards that include a 5V 3-Pin Addressable RGB Header to synchronize and have their lighting effects modified.The Gamdias BOREAS E1-410 WH CPU Air Cooler has 02 years warranty.
